means: 登上，骑上( mount的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Her husband mounts the work on velour paper and makes the frame.
sentence.Network_cn: 她丈夫把作品装裱在绒纸上，并制作了画框。

sentence.Network_en: The uncollected garbage mounts in city streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 未收的垃圾在市区街道上越积越多。

sentence.Network_en: White backlash increases as the pressure for change in South Africa mounts.
sentence.Network_cn: 南非求变的压力升高,白人的敌意也加深.

entry.def: If you mount a campaign or event, you organize it and make it take place.

example.ex: The ANC announced it was mounting a major campaign of mass political protests.
example.tran: 非洲人国民大会宣布他们正在开展一次大规模政治抗议活动。

example.ex: ...a security operation mounted by the army.
example.tran: 军队开展的维护安全军事行动

entry.def: If something mounts, it increases in intensity.

example.tran: 有几个小时，紧张局势有所加剧。

entry.def: If something mounts, it increases in quantity.

example.ex: The uncollected garbage mounts in city streets...
example.tran: 未收的垃圾在市区街道上越积越多。
他对日益增加的债务置之不理。

entry.def: If you mount the stairs or a platform, you go up the stairs or go up onto the platform.

example.ex: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep...
example.tran: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

entry.def: If you mount a horse or cycle, you climb on to it so that you can ride it.

example.ex: He mounted his horse and rode away...
A man in a crash helmet was mounting a motorbike...
example.tran: 一位戴头盔的男子正跨上摩托车。

example.ex: ...the number of owners who care for older mounts.
example.tran: 愿意照料老马的马主的数量

entry.def: If you mount an object on something, you fix it there firmly.

example.ex: Her husband mounts the work on velour paper and makes the frame...
example.tran: 她丈夫把作品装裱在绒纸上，并制作了画框。

example.ex: The support for the fence is mounted on an extension to the table.
example.tran: 篱笆的支撑部分安装在桌子延长出的地方。

entry.def: If you mount an exhibition or display, you organize and present it.

example.ex: The gallery has mounted an exhibition of art by Irish women painters.
example.tran: 画廊已举办了一场爱尔兰女画家的作品展。

entry.def: Mount is used as part of the name of a mountain.

auth_sentence.content: Ye mounts Where I climb to 'scape my fellow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ye mounts Where I climb to 'scape my fellow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ye mounts Where I climb to 'scape my fellow.

auth_sentence.content: He mounts his bicycle...and goes scudding down the rough drive.
auth_sentence.res_content: He mounts his bicycle...and goes scudding down the rough drive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He mounts his bicycle...and goes scudding down the rough drive.

auth_sentence.content: The moon, serene in glory, mounts the sky.
auth_sentence.res_content: The moon, serene in glory, mounts the sky.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The moon, serene in glory, mounts the sky.
